definition.name: NXprogram

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

definition.doc: Base class to describe a software tool or library.

field.name: program
field.doc: Given name of the program. Program can be a commercial one a script, or a library or a library component.

attribute.name: version
attribute.doc: Program version plus build number, or commit hash.

attribute.name: url
attribute.doc: Description of an ideally ever persistent resource where the source code of the program or this specific compiled version of the program can be found so that the program yields repeatably exactly the same numerical and categorical results.
